## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have removed any console.logs and debugging code

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md file
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on different browsers (if frontend change)
- [ ] I have tested on different screen sizes (if frontend change)

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have run `pnpm audit` and addressed any security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not added unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] I have updated package.json versions appropriately

### Security

- [ ] I have not exposed any sensitive information (API keys, credentials, etc.)
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have followed security best practices

### Performance

- [ ] My changes do not significantly impact performance
- [ ] I have optimized database queries (if applicable)
- [ ] I have minimized bundle size impact (if frontend change)
